'''Fresh Sakura Bloom''' is a [[Quest Item]] gathered in the [[Commission]], [[The Gourmet Supremos: Where'd the Ingredients Go?]] It is the fresh variant of [[Sakura Bloom]]. This variant can be gathered without using {{Electro}} despite appearing as normal [[Sakura Bloom]] clusters in the open world.

==How to Obtain==
*Walk along the river near [[Julie]]'s location to reach quest area. Two Fresh Sakura Blooms can be found near an [[Electro Abyss Mage]] under the first waterfall.
*One Fresh Sakura Bloom is located on top of the same waterfall.
